body:
Comment 2: 
I don't mean to be impatient, rather I'd like to find out if there's anything else I can
do to help this issue get fixed faster? I want to start fixing another issue in astutil,
but it's harder to do until this one is fixed.

Above, I've provided:

- Reproducible steps that demonstrate the problem.
- A detailed analysis of the code explaining where the root problem lies (and how it
came to be, linking to the relevant revision).
- A new failing test case.
- A sample patch that fixes the problem and makes all tests pass.

Anything else I can do to help? The only thing I can think of would be going through the
steps at http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html and trying to create my first CL - should
I be doing that? Thank you!
